title: Turkish wildfires burn out of control as local officials plead for help
content:
1. Turkish wildfires burn out of control as local officials plead for help  The Washington Post
  2. Turkey wildfires: Eight dead as blazes sweep through tourist resorts  BBC News
  3. Firefighters in Turkey battle wildfires as flames race across hills  Global News

localize.title: トルコで発生した山火事は制御不能に陥り、地元関係者は救助を求めています。
